photoeffects: Vivid, Neutral, Low Sharpening, Sepia, Black & White, Custom
intervalometer: Up to 100 shots in 1 – 60 minute increments²
batteries: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery BP-511A / BP-514/ BP-511 / BP-512 (BP-511A battery and charger supplied)
selectedafpointdisplay: Indicated in viewfinder or indicated on rear LCD panel
continuousshooting: High Speed at approx. 2.5 fps¹ (speed maintained for up to 6 images) Normal at approx. 1.0 fps¹ (speed maintained for up to 18 images)²
batterylife: Approx. 420 shots (LCD monitor on) Approx. 420 shots (Electronic viewfinder on) Approx. 400 min. (Playback)
flash: Canon Speedlites (220EX, 380EX, 420EX, 550EX, Macro-Ring-Lite MR–14EX, Macro Twin Lite MT-24EX, Speedlite Transmitter ST-E2)
menucategories: (1) Recording Menu (2) Playback menu (3) Set-up menu (4) My camera menu (5) Function menu
aflock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way
displayformats: Single/ Index (9 thumbnail images)/ Slide Show/ Magnified/ Movie
stillimagetype: JPEG (Exif 2.21 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, RAW, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
externalflash: E-TTL with EX series Speedlites, wireless multi-flash support
construction: 14 elements in 10 groups,L-series lens (1 Fluorite, 1 UD glass & 2 aspherical elements)
manualpoweradjustment: 3 levels with internal flash (13 levels with external EX Speedlites)
modes: Auto, Program AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual, Custom (2), Portrait, Landscape, Night Scene, Stitch Assist, Movie
brightness: Adjustable to one of two levels
meteringmodes: Evaluative, Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre or linked to focusing frame)
powersupplybatterychargers: AC Power Adapter CA-560, Battery Charger (single) CB-5L (supplied in camera kit), Battery Charger (Twin) CG-560/570/580, Car Battery Adapter CR-560, Car Battery Cable CB-560/570
menulanguages: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
lenses: Tele-converter 1.5x TC-DC58A Lens hood LH-DC58A Conversion Lens Adapter LA-DC58C Filter Adapter FA-DC58A
